channel.title: writing on The Emacs Cat
channel.description: Recent content in writing on The Emacs Cat

item.title: Use abbrev to Enter Special Characters
item.description: As it’s described in the GNU Emacs Manual, an abbreviation or abbrev is a string of characters that may be expanded to a longer string. The user can insert the abbrev string and find it replaced automatically with the expansion of the abbrev. This saves typing.
